characters.name: Menace
characters.desc: The Magnetic Menace created by the gods to annhilate the kingdoms inhabitants. He had a change of heart.
characters.lore: once upon a time a small boy chilled in some grass. The boy looked up in the sky and begun to stare at the night sky. Then an overpowering deity came along and decided to ruin the kids night by grappling him to death. Menace shall rule.

characters.name: Strife
characters.desc: a space cop determined to capture all criminals. He is unaware of the truth behind his employers.

characters.name: Advent
characters.desc: A lone shrine maiden who left her village after being accused of being a Witch. She has a cold personality.

characters.name: Excelsus
characters.desc: the last warrior of the kingdom, fighting to keep his legacy alive.

characters.name: Strikeout
characters.desc: A young prodigy baseball player with skills never before seen in a human... how?

characters.name: Meat
characters.desc: An old man who lost everything, but was graced with a new life purpose to look after Ball. He is made of food.
characters.perception:
**Strength of Food**
As a being from the Food dimension, Meat has power equal to 10x that of an average human.

characters.name: Ball
characters.desc: A young sentient meatball adopted by Meat. She is immortal, but she doesn't know that.She's just a lil gal!
characters.perception:
**Unrotting**
> Ball is unable to die in any way, as the meat will always reform back into her original shape.
**Strength of Food**
> As a being from the Food dimension, Ball has power equal to 10x that of an average human.

characters.name: Clairvoyant
characters.desc: A deity from another world with mysterious powers able to manipulate reality.
characters.perception:
> **Reality Control**
> Clairvoyant has full control over the reality around him. He mainly does this through the use of illusions and gates.

characters.name: Taboo (Mask)
characters.desc: An evil mask created thousands of years ago. It manifests in malice, and controls anyone that the mask attaches to.

characters.name: Scav
characters.desc: a vagrant who travels the world looking for trinkets. She has her own reasons for collecting these things...

characters.name: Travis
characters.desc: One of the many harbingers of death, specifically the one to overlook the Abyss. He exists to assure the rules of nature are followed.

characters.name: Nemesis
characters.desc: a mysterious warrior from another timeline. He wants to save the world from the fate that his own world faced.

characters.name: Fray
characters.desc: The maid of the mysterious mansion, although her master never seems to be home. She is very inefficient and aggressive.
characters.perception:
**Duty Calls**
> Through sheer will power to perform her job to an acceptable degree, Fray is capable of bringing out her immense human strength if it proves to be efficient at that time.

characters.name: The Beast
characters.desc: A creature capable of mass destruction. He was sealed away by Advent after attacking her village, but was eventually freed by her on purpose.

characters.name: Thingamabob
characters.desc: a contraption that seemed to appear out of nowhere. Its purpose is entirely unknown, and it appears to be sentient.

characters.name: Loopion
characters.desc: The metaphorical demon inside Travis. He is a remnant of a bygone era, but fights to bring back the old system
characters.perception:
**Legacy Loop**
> Loopion is capable of manipulating the flow of time of the universe he is in.... Or, well, he used to. His methods are outdated, but they still have some slight effects on the world, only much weaker than he would like.
**Lagslayer**
> Loopion is capable of freezing the flow of time through overloading the backend, but as long as a Travis exists in that world, this wont last for very long.

dimensions.name: The Kingdom
dimensions.desc: A toy box for the gods.
dimensions.lore: There is no free will here.
